posts.post_content:
For sale is a 1911 T205 Walter Johnson SGC 50 with a sweet caporal back. This is a sweet looking card of the big train that presents pretty nicely. The registration looks really good on this one. $Sold delivered. I accept cash, check, and money order. Paypal gift is also accepted. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions. Thanks!

$Sold
